page.title: 14HORBURY SATURDAY IN JULY 85
page.content: I usually get up at 9am, go downstairs and have a boiled egg for breakfast. Then I put on my red and black leotard, skirt and T-shirt before going to a gymnastics class at Cleckheaton, west of Horbury. We start at 10am and finish at noon. I do somersaults and back flips. My coach is Mrs Warmby, assisted by Elaine Woodhead.Then we go to the Halfway House public house, halfway to Ossett, for lunch. We have roast beef and vegetables or chip butties. We play on the swings and inflatable cushion in the beer garden. Then we go to my grandmother's in Horbury.My sister Vicki and I play outside on the coalbunker. For tea we have a ham salad followed by strawberries and cream or jelly. Then I watch Ultra Quiz 85 on TV until I go to bed at 10.15 and read. I go to sleep at 11.
